TopicTitle: 101+ reasons why we are not NASA

Articles.Content:
143. We put asteroids on collision courses with Kerbin for fun.

144. We are capable of doing the above.

145. Then jousting with it.
146. Being green, our astronauts are always minty fresh no matter how long the duration of the mission.

147 . Kerbalnauts have not heard of health and safety

148. They have also not heard of a "complaint box".
149. Parachutes are in fact not required to fly these rockets.
150: Our engines make noise in vacuum.
151. We have ÃƒÂ¼berpowerful EVA suits.
We have struts!

We have a safety system called "EVA and land on your helmet"

Our system has only three forms of life: Kerbals, grass and the Kraken

Going to the mÃƒÂ¼n is like going to work/school

Math is an opinion

Testing? What does this word means?

We can explode Kerbin with some I beams

We can vanish the universe by going into Jool center (if you don't believe me go on youtube and watch some of danny's videos)
We don't know how to count.
161: We don't need life support due to photosynthetic skin.
162) we have squishy.
163. We don't copy off of the Germans, but still manage to go to space.

164. We're actually interested in exploring and exploiting space.

165. We've never killed a legitimate DARPA project because "space is our job. waaaaah!"

166. We build rockets out of stuff we find lying on the side of the road, but they work anyway!

>_> I think I may be too young to be this bitter about NASA.
167. we use chairs for reentry

168. We crash Kerbals onto Kerbin at 20,000 m/s

169. We have rebornable Kerbanauts.
170. we launch kerbals out of sol's sphere of influence.
171. we launch our employees into the air on a SRB using only ductape.
172. We don't let a trivial thing like re-entry flames stop us from deploying parachutes.

173 .We don't consult with the engineers to make sure there is no fatal flaw such as forgetting to add a power source for the probes

174 . We mod our game.

175 . We have the restart button.

176. Instead of employing a team of highly skilled number-crunching boffins to calculate the most accurate burn time for our next manoeuvre, we tug on a node handle just... a... little... more... that-a-way. Perfect.
177. Close enough doesn't mean several yards away from intended landing point. (Unless your'e talking about lander legs in relation to the lander.)
178. What aerodynamics?
179 . We have infiglide
180. If everything else fails, we'll try complete the mission with RCS suit only. Astronauts may be parked in any orbit, to be picked up "later".

181 . We are allowed to put seats on SRBs

182 . Nobody tries to use our space program for military purposes, we do it.

183 . Our Kerbalnauts are mute so they can't complain.
